title: inverter_power_on_after_night_shutdown_constraint_operation
summary: Hybrid solar inverter turned on to restore household power after earlier shutdown; operation resumed later due to constraints.
description: This data unit records the hybrid solar inverter being turned on at MaMeeFarm on 2026-01-05 08:40 (Asia/Bangkok) to restore household power. This action references the inverter shutdown recorded in data unit 00033 at 01:11. Power was restored relatively late in the morning, reflecting operational constraints at the farm.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
